ComicInfo.Summary:
“BEWARE THE SCOURGE”
Enter the sinister leader of Toronto’s underworld: the deadly Scourge! Malcolm Dragon faces his biggest challenge to date and the world he knows hangs in the balance.
ComicInfo.Title: Save the Future!; Beware the Scourge!
ComicInfo.Writer: Erik Larsen,Brandon B.,James Squires,Simon Mallette St-Pierre,Brandon B.,James Squires,Simon Mallette St-Pierre,Erik Larsen
